author: Special Correspondent
text:
Police recovered the bodies of a family of three persons at their residence in Sundar Nagar near Mathur on Saturday.

The body of Prasad (30), an employee attached to the Office of the Deputy Inspector-General of Police, Tiruchi, was found hanging from the ceiling, while the bodies of his wife Mangayarkarasi (23) and a one-year-old girl Merlin Thersa were found lying on the floor in a highly decomposed condition.

Following foul smell, neighbours sighted the bodies through a window and alerted the police.

The Mathur police have registered a case and are investigating. The bodies have been sent for post-mortem.
title: Man, wife and child found dead
